txt.en:
'Your efforts have been valiant, [placeholder], but I fear they will come to naught. The half-orcs have brethren encamped in the Redhorn Gate, and Dunlendings in the service of Saruman are encamped not far to the east.

'I ask that you go to Echad Dúnann to the east, near the gates of Moria called the Doors of Durin, and speak with Glavroleth. Warn her of the threat of the half-orcs...perhaps she will have some insight into their presence.

'Go forth without delay, [placeholder]. I fear an evil tide is rising.'

'Welcome, [placeholder]. You come with tidings from Lengliel?\n\n'The half-orcs have entered the ruins of Eregion? This is old news to us, but Lengliel is right to be concerned. There is some evil at work here, against which we must prepare ourselves.'
'Go to Echad Dúnann, [placeholder], and warn Glavroleth of the half-orc threat.'
Lengliel fears that the half-orcs at Barad Morlas and Pembar may call reinforcements from the east.
Talk to Glavroleth at Echad Dúnann
Echad Dúnann lies along the road south and east from Echad Eregion, in Nan Sirannon.\n\nLengliel has asked you to seek out Glavroleth at Echad Dúnann.
